convertDate

private java.lang.String convertDate(java.lang.String dateString)
Formats a date from YYYY-MM-DD into Month day, Year. Eg. Takes in 1979-12-12 and spits out December 12, 1979.

Parameters:
dateString - The date string as YYYY-MM-DD
Returns:
The date formatted by Month day, Year
